{"id":526225698,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1626903419,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/526225698/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"7.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int n = word1.size();\n        int m = word2.size();\n        int dp [n+1][m+1];\n        \n        for(int i =0;i<n;i++){\n            for(int j =0 ;j<m;j++){\n                dp[i][j] =0;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        for(int i =0 ;i<=n;i++){\n            dp[i][0] = i;\n        }\n        for(int i =0 ;i<=m;i++){\n            dp[0][i] = i;\n        }\n        \n        for(int i =1 ;i<=n;i++){\n            for(int j = 1;j<=m;j++){\n                if(word1[i-1] == word2[j-1]){\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1];\n                }\n                else {\n                    dp[i][j] = 1+ min( dp[i-1][j], min(dp[i][j-1],dp[i-1][j-1]));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[n][m];\n        \n        \n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance"}
